metadata.name: Santa Swap Participation Ticket
metadata.description:
In exchange of your generous donation, Santa's Elves have granted you a Santa Swap Participation Ticket. This festive season, use this ticket to participate in the NFT Gift Exchange, swapping JPEGs and sharing joy.

This NFT is a part of the 2021 Santa Swap eventâ€”a Secret Santa NFT exchange donating 100% of proceeds to charity.
